Ebbro 43662 Datsun Bluebird 1300SS (P411) 1966 East African Safari Rally 5th Place J. Greenly/J. Dunk

Manufacturer page: [url]http://ebbro.co.jp/item_race/nissan/43662.html[/url]
Purchased: 2013

(from Datsun and The East African Safari Rally)

At the 14th East African Safari Rally held in 1966, Nissan made history as this vehicle was the first Japanese car to win in its class (under 1,300cc). A pair of Bluebird P411s driven by the teams of John Greenly/John Dunk and Jock Aird/Robin Hillyar came in 5th and 6th overall and 1st and 2nd in class. More importantly, both cars completed the course in a race that 88 cars entered and only 9 finished.

As for the model it's a nice effort from Ebbro but just now noticed its missing the Coca Cola logos on the rear fenders!
